subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] This is what I'm talking about!
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0048_01C9DDD3.FF1F2940
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Me? I am doing this for myself first and foremost. If others gain something=
 from work I am doing, great, but I am only in it to further my own knowled=
ge, and not for self aggrandizement or fame, but to satisfy my own curiosit=
y, and maybe for some cheap thrills to boot :)

  ----- Original Message --=
--- 
  From: Frank Sumption 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday=
, May 26, 2009 7:26 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] This is what I'm talking ab=
out!






   This is the stuff that gives me concern for those attracted t=
o the paranormal--are they friggin' crazy!? There's so much of this back st=
abbing, name calling BS in this field, and for what, is anyone getting rich=
, is anyone getting famous on some obscure cable TV show? What about the po=
dcasts at a dime a hundred?

   Is anyone making any advancements? Probably=
 not, so some have to cut everyone else down to make themsleves look import=
ant. 

  There's only one important question at the monent, are you service=
 to self, or service to others?

   Frank-S


  On Mon, May 25, 2009 at 9:4=
8 PM, Misty Dawn <bulletbabea@...> wrote:




          O go ahead an=
d just say Bruce and get it over with. Oh wait nevermind I just did that fo=
r ya didnt I.

          --- On Mon, 5/25/09, Frank Sumption <purplealiengi=
rl@...> wrote:


            From: Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@gm=
ail.com>
            Subject: [EVP-ITC] This is what I'm talking about!
   =
         To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
            Date: Monday, May 25, 2009=
, 11:31 PM 



             Why I've had enough of these insane idiots in t=
he so called paranormal. God forbid anyone should question their little pea=
rls of wisdom flowing from their sacred keyboards.

             I''ve said=
 it before, and I'll say it again, I do this work for my own curiosity, I d=
on't seek fame and fortune like these others do, and I have no ego to puff =
up to the world. I do not care if anyone uses my boxes, I don't even sell t=
he crap. It ain't gonna matter---the comet is on it's way! Y'all have three=
 years, I'd use the time wisely.

             I left the name off this, bu=
t anyone can probably figure out who sent it, the same person that attacks =
many researchers in this field. 

            "Frank,
             
       =
     You have a big mouth on that piece of shit group evp-itc come over to =
the---- group where I can respond to your fuckin retarded rants. You call m=
e a crack head, you senile old idiot, don't hate people for being your supe=
rior in the field just because your boxes are crap now and nobody uses them=
 for anything other than dust collecters. If I were you I would go back int=
o the bathroom sit on the bowl and think about what an obscure hasbeen assh=
ole you have become. 
             
            Come to my group and open y=
our mouth and I'll take the wind right out of your fuckin sails.
          =
   
            All is possible, nothing is probable"
